mapper.select: select rno,coid, cosfile, coAuthorKor, coAuthorEng, cotitle, coYear from( select rownum rno,coid, cosfile, coAuthorKor, coAuthorEng, cotitle, coYear from (select coid, cosfile, coAuthorKor, coAuthorEng, cotitle, coYear,codate from collection ORDER BY codate desc)) where rno between #{start} and #{end}

select coid,cotitle,cofile,cosfile,cocontent,cohits,coauthorkor,coauthoreng, coname,coyear,comaterial,cocategory,comanageid,codim,coisdisp,previd,prevtitle,nextid,nexttitle from (select coid,cotitle,cofile,cosfile,cocontent,cohits,coauthorkor,coauthoreng, coname,coyear,comaterial,comanageid,codim,coisdisp,cocategory, lag(coid,1,0)over(order by codate)as previd, lag(cotitle,1,0)over(order by codate)as prevtitle, lead(coid,1,0)over(order by codate)as nextid, lead(cotitle,1,0)over(order by codate)as nexttitle from collection) where coid=#{coId}
mapper.update: update collection set cohits=cohits+1 where coId=#{coid}
